response.job_title: Solar Energy | Wind Energy | Hydrogen | Renewable Energy | Sustainability | Energy Data Analysis | Electrical Engineering | Data Science |  Hydropower | Electrical Safety | Python | Data Mining
response.summary: Resourceful Energy Data Analyst versed in reducing energy consumption and eliminating maintenance costs by introducing sustainable and cost-effective strategies. Develops energy efficiency program methods, reviews outcomes, and manages technical input. Collaborates with team members to deliver diverse renewable energy consultancy commissions. Identifies energy efficiency opportunities and introduces prescriptive and custom incentive measures aligned with customer segment. Monitors projects by adhering to production schedule and budget, managing production team, identifying problems, and providing targeted solutions.
response.skills: Electrical Engineering, Automation, Commissioning, Problem Solving, Project Management, Creativity Skills, Team Collaboration, Decision-Making, Critical Thinking, Easily Adaptable, Electrical Safety, Revenue Generation, Teamwork, Python (Programming Language), HTML5, JScript, Cascading Style Sheets (CSS), Renewable Energy Systems, Solar Energy, Wind Energy

profile_positions.description:
- Verified compliance with the evaluation requirements established by the regulations for Non-Conventional Energy Sources and Efficient Energy Management projects.
- Contributed to the technical evaluation of Non-Conventional Energy Sources and Efficient Energy Management project applications.
- Analyzed more than 200 renewable energy generation projects in 2022 such as solar, wind, biomass and geothermal.
- Assisted with a variety of tasks, as directed by the Incentives Coordinator, including responding to requests for project information and answering users' queries, among others.
- Followed up with the Planning Office and reported on the tax incentive process's management metrics.
profile_positions.title: Renewable Energy Projects Analyst

profile_positions.description:
- Participated in the energy supply concept and mathematical modeling for the Colombian National Energy Plan.
- Prepare analyses on the role of energy efficiency, non-conventional energy sources, and other trends in the nation's energy sector.
- Assist the certification process for Nonconventional Energy Sources and Efficient Energy Management projects, including information assessment, technical evaluation, support for external customers, and process enhancements.
- Develop and implement information systems and management indicators for monitoring the tax incentive process, with a focus on response times.
- Establish and maintain a public information system comprising variables relevant to energy planning and decision-making in the public and commercial sectors.
profile_positions.title: Specialized Professional

profile_positions.description:
- Verified compliance with the evaluation requirements established by the regulations for Non-Conventional Energy Sources and Efficient Energy Management projects.
- Contributed to the technical evaluation of Non-Conventional Energy Sources and Efficient Energy Management project applications.
- Analyzed more than 200 renewable energy generation projects in 2022 such as solar, wind, biomass and geothermal.
- Assisted with a variety of tasks, as directed by the Incentives Coordinator, including responding to requests for project information and answering users' queries, among others.
- Followed up with the Planning Office and reported on the tax incentive process's management metrics.
profile_positions.title: Renewable Energy Project Analyst

profile_positions.description:
- Verified compliance with the evaluation requirements established by the regulations for Non-Conventional Energy Sources and Efficient Energy Management projects.
- Contributed to the technical evaluation of Non-Conventional Energy Sources and Efficient Energy Management project applications.
- Analyzed more than 150 renewable energy generation projects in 2021 such as solar, wind, biomass and geothermal.
- Kept the tax incentive web page with up-to-date information on the procedure and relevant rules and coordinating web page enhancements.
- Aided with the BPM tool's procedure for automating the process.
- Completed energy supply data requests, to support state Renewable Energy Portfolio mandates, greenhouse gas emissions reporting, and federal energy supply filings.
profile_positions.title: Renewable Energy Project Analyst

profile_positions.description:
- Evaluated the operating and electrical safety conditions necessary for the efficient operation of electric chargers designed to power electric buses.
- Supervised StarCharge electric charger laboratory tests, site installation, setup, and commissioning.
- Supported the installation of over 400 electric chargers in Colombia to promote electromobility. The first ones utilized for the nation's electric bus fleet.
profile_positions.title: Electrical Safety Consultant

profile_positions.description:
- Provided technical assistance for computational simulations of the ferro-resonant effect in electrical substations with 13.2 kV and 34.5 kV voltage levels.
- Identified potential protocol enhancements for the client's medium voltage substation design and cable equipotentiality.
- Operated and troubleshot equipment, instruments and associated software and routinely performed quality control on instrumentation to comply with established specifications.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Monitored multiple projects from project start through delivery by prioritizing needs and delegating assignments.
- Supervised in a technical and economic manner the start-up of the first test field in Colombia for the pre-qualification of high voltage (150 kV) subway cables.
- Coordinated the launch of the initial test field for the execution of electrical tests on XLPE high voltage wires.
- Oversaw the setup, commissioning, and operation of a real-time simulator for Power Hardware in the Loop (PHIL) testing.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Supervised the company's solar photovoltaic and electrical asset management programs.
Provided technical guidance for solar photovoltaic power production plant design and electrical safety consultancy projects.
- Conducted the technical analysis of electrical safety for upgrades in hydroelectric plants of more than one thousand megawatts, identifying opportunities for improvement to protect the lives of people engaged in operation and maintenance activities, as well as the operability of equipment in the event of a failure.
- Evaluated the solar resource availability for over 300 MW of solar photovoltaic projects.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Monitored multiple projects from project start through delivery by prioritizing needs and delegating assignments.
- Coordinated the budget and implementation of lighting equipment testing, high voltage electrical testing, and other projects.
- Controlled and verified compliance with the commitments acquired with clients and laboratory accreditation entities.
- Formulated the project for the construction of the first test field in Colombia for the pre-qualification of high voltage (150 kV) subway cables.
- Collaborated on the NC2018/0009809 patent, which describes a device for reducing electric field intensity beneath high voltage lines.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

company.name: UPME Oficial
company.description: La Unidad de Planeación Minero Energética UPME es una Unidad Administrativa Especial del orden Nacional, de carácter técnico, adscrita al Ministerio de Minas y Energía, regida por la Ley 143 de 1994 y por el Decreto número 255 de enero 28 de 2004. La entidad hace parte del Gobierno de Colombia
